INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of very large decrease of the concentrations of aprepitant
Risk of decrease of the effect of the vitamin K antagonist due to increase of its hepatic metabolism by the aprepitant
INTERACTION.COMMENT: More frequent testing of the INR. Adjustment of the dosage of the vitamin K antagonist during and after the administration of the medications together.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of decrease of the concentrations of the cyproterone with risk of lower contraceptive effectiveness
INTERACTION.COMMENT: --In its use as a homonal contraceptive. Use a reliable contraceptive method, additional or alternative during the time these medications are taken together.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the concentrations of the estrogen-progestin or of the progestin, with risk of lower contraceptive effectiveness.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Chose another contraceptive method, in particular a barrier type, during the time these medications are taken together and a cycle following.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of increase of the neurotoxicity of the ifosfamide
Increase of the concentrations of aprepitant due to decrease of its hepatic metabolism by the itraconazole.
Increased risk of ventricular arrhythmias, especially of torsades de pointes
(Except for IUD), decrease of the concentrations of progestin, with risk of lower contraceptive effectiveness.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Choose another method of contraception, in particular a barrier type, during the administration of these medications together and a cycle after.
